div.p: The weekly Counseling Newsletter is here! https://www.smore.com/1azxy

Today is Earth Day! We would like to share a quote from Lady Bird Johnson: "The environment is where we all meet; where all have a mutual interest; it is one thing all of us share." So today, take some time to enjoy the beautiful picture nature is painting for us!
It's "Health Tip Tuesday" and for the cherry lovers out there, this is going to make your day!
It's "Motivational Monday" and the message today is to believe. Take a look!
